text: The Museum Tower is a high-rise office building located in the Government Center district of Downtown Miami, Florida, United States. As its name implies, the building is situated across the street from HistoryMiami (and the former Miami Art Museum), which are both part of the Miami Cultural Plaza. The visibility of Museum Tower from I-95 provides it a valuable location. The building has 29 stories and stands at a height of , and excluding the restaurant at its lobby, Fresh Grub, the Museum Tower is used completely as class A office space. Bank of America and AT&T; (formerly BellSouth) are Museum Tower's principal tenants. ==References== == External links == *Gaedeke Group - Museum Tower *Emporis - Museum Tower *Fresh Grub Category:Office buildings completed in 1986 Category:Skyscraper office buildings in Miami Category:1986 establishments in Florida
title: Museum Tower (Miami)
